Address: 145 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
PERFECTLY RENOVATED HOME OR INVESTMENT.
Appealing immediately with bright natural north light, this home is fully renovated inside and out with a warm welcome as you open the front door. Well - appointed with a separate lounge and dining room, a second living area with an open kitchen flowing between both, doors open to the undercover fernery and paved entertainment area. Three bedrooms all have BIR'S, serviced by a superb central bathroom, separate laundry and toilet. Decked undercover entertaining space is ready to enjoy. It is all here for you to just relax. Features include 2 split systems, new floorboards throughout, new window furnishings,new kitchen cupboards, hot water system and more. Large four-car garage (9x6m), has ample space for the cars,caravan, boat and trailer. This home will impress , close to schools, shops, the bay and all amenities. Great rental situation, low maintenance. Ready for you or tenants to move in now!

Description:
You Do The Math!
Upon reflection this property will undoubtedly be recorded as one of 3222's most savvy purchases in 2017.
If you're a facts and figures purchaser then this double storey commercial building is the one for you!
Boasting an impressive build over two levels - down stairs shop front with thriving local business. A long term tenant offers excellent rental income -
an outstanding 3 bedroom apartment upstairs with finishes of the highest calibre and equally impressive water views
The facts and figures:
-Shop Front Rental Income - $18,720 p/a (inclusive GST) which includes council rates, water levies including sewerage and building insurance.
-Long term tenant with prominent local business (year 6 of 3x3 lease 31st March 2017) who has indicated a plan
to extend the lease agreement.
The upstairs apartment showcases a fine example of open plan apartment living. A sea of spotted gum timber floors, stainless steel appliances, luxury oversized shower, a double vanity and feature louvre windows offer just a hint to the 'spare no expense' attitude to this impressive build.
Other key features include:
-Covered alfresco zone, complete with outdoor kitchen with impressive water views across to the You Yangs
-10ft ceilings with several 13ft feature skylights to ensure an abundance of natural light.
-A spiral staircase and an additional outdoor terrace make a lovely garden feature.
-Enormous garage and workshop 11m x 5.7 (3.3 ceiling height); cleverly designed with an additional shower and powder room.
Simply too many other features to mention. Strictly by
private appointment only!
Insights: 15 Dumburra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A QUIET LIFESTYLE WITH GLIMPSES OF THE BAY
If you are looking for a beautifully kept 2 bedroom unit perfect for a down sizer or investor this could be the one, situated in a quiet court.
- 2 large bedrooms with built in wardrobes
- Great sized living area
- Excellent kitchen with electric oven, gas cook top and plenty of cupboards
- Air-conditioned and gas heating
- Full bathroom with separate shower
- Secure front garden with views
- Close to the bay and boat ramp
- Close to Clifton Springs golf club
Come on down to the Bellarine and enjoy all the trimmings that living on the Bellarine has to offer.

Description:
AFFORDABLE BIG FAMILY HOME, BUY WELL AND ENJOY THE GENEROUS PROPORTIONS.
Close to the jetty, schools, clubs and parklands... a wealth of living for the astute buyer. The open plan area at the rear of the home includes living, kitchen and dining, all overlooking the undercover decking, second lounge and separate dining as well. Three bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, remaining two with BIR's, study, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include central heating, split system, new carpet, dishwasher, pantry and more. Freestanding double garage and easy to maintain garden. This is all about living easy on the Bellarine.

Description:
Two Houses Are Better than One on 956m2
Situated in a quiet established street in Clifton Springs this four bedroom home has the addition of a modern self-contained,second residence. Needing the inspired, home renovator the main residence has great bones and features include
- two living areas, both with access to an expansive north-facing outdoor living area
- four bedrooms, two bathrooms
- spacious kitchen
- gas central heating
- spacious back yard with garden shedding
- garage with remote
New or as new fencing with great yard space and peaceful reserve at the rear.
The 4 year old second residence has modern interior with neutral decor, pitched ceiling to the living area and a lovely full length north-facing veranda.
Features include RC air con, gas HWS and attached cat run which would easily convert to an enclosure for some happy hens. Contact agent for inspection.

Description:
A great family home
Newly renovated cedar home with a welcoming wrap around verandah. Ideally suited for a large family needing space. Two separate living areas one with polished timber floors and the other tiled. Four bedrooms with built in robes and freshly laid carpet.
Open plan kitchen & dining with near new modern appliances. Spacious lounge with formal dining alcove at the front of the house and study nook at the rear in the second living area.
Spacious recently renovated central bathroom with large double walk-in shower.
Galvanized double garage with two good sized utility sheds. Plenty of space to park the boat or caravan and ample off street parking.
Located within easy walking distance to the Clifton Springs Bowls & Golf Clubs, The Dell Picnic Ground & Clifton Springs boat ramp.
A very exciting opportunity to enter the market or invest.

Description:
Don't Let This One Pass You By!
If you're looking to invest or wanting a long settlement then this immaculate property may just offer the perfect solution. The vendors are wanting to move on mid 2018 but wish to offer their home to the market now. The home offers open plan kitchen and meals area (access to decking) with adjoining formal lounge room. A second spacious living area is located more to the rear of the home. All 3 bedrooms are generously proportioned and 2 have robes. The study could also double as a smaller 4th bedroom if desired. The home is kept comfortable during the cooler months by central heating. Set on a 585m2 gardened allotment with freestanding garage this property is a delight to inspect. So if you're an investor looking for the perfect tenants and an ideal property then you may have just found it. Alternatively if you wish to reside in the home but need a long settlement then this scenario may also work well too!

Address: 1-3 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Haven By The Sea
1-3 Sea Haven Drive is a fine example of a quality built residence that perfectly blends size and scale with a warm welcoming home feel.
This contemporary home really hits the brief if you desire property boasting multiple living zones of generous proportions. The kitchen/family/meals area is 'light n bright' and offers a lovely orientation to take in views of the established garden setting.
The kitchen boasts ample storage solutions and serves up a user friendly design. Double sliding glass doors offer a seamless connection to a paved alfresco living area; a gable roof design and a northerly orientation ensure you are bathed in an abundance of natural light.
A 2nd defined living area is simply massive yet it still presents as a cosy welcoming space for the family to take in a movie.
Boasting 4 bedrooms; the master complete with an ensuite and walk in robe. The remaining 3 bedrooms have built in robes.
Not only is this home set within an exclusive pocket of Clifton Springs it also possesses the enviable feature or being a corner allotment. A dual cross over and side access ensures your imagination can run wild regarding housing the caravan, boat and/or building the shed you had almost given up on (STCA).
All the modern comforts including ducted heating, split system air conditioning, established gardens and many more fine features to be discovered upon inspection.
Set within an exclusive pocket of Clifton Springs and surrounded by quality homes would suggest this property stamps itself a great home for today and a savvy investment for the future.

Address: 28 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
SUPERB HOME! SUPERB WATER VIEWS! PRIME POSITION, 5 MINUTES WALK TO WATERS EDGE
A custom built home with loads of style, generous proportions throughout and quality fittings and fixtures... as new. Downstairs a gracious entrance, second living (with outdoor spa) which opens to the undercover patio, three bedrooms, one with WIR, others have BIR's, central bathroom, a cellar room or.... use as required, laundry and separate toilet. The wide staircase allows for an easy flow to the magic of the top level, the open plan space includes gourmet kitchen, informal meals as well as formal dining and plenty of room for the second living, all with doors opening to a wraparound balcony with fantastic bay views. The master bedroom here has extra-large ensuite and WIR, study and powder room. Features include central heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vac., butlers pantry, loads of storage, window shutters, stone benches, ilve s/s oven, water tank and so much more. Double garage, workshop completes the plan. A big family home yet warm and inviting... this home stands out!

Description:
Elegant and contemporary gem
Situated on one acre, this wonderful and unique property represents all that you have dreamed for. The entrance and circular driveway with fountain symbolises what you are in for, something special. This two storey house has room for all your needs. There are five elegant bedrooms, all of which come with spacious built in wardrobes. The master bedroom, on the upper floor, has a spacious ensuite with hydro bath tub. The views from the upper living area are stunning, going from the You Yangs, Geelong, the green hills, the Bay and beyond. The large formal dining room is serviced by the open plan kitchen, adjacent to the generous living room and dining room. To keep everyone warm, the wood fire heater wards off the winter chills. Central heating and cooling as well as split system airconditioners. Two laundry rooms are used for both the main residence and the granny apartment. Yes, separate yet not secluded, there is a self contained apartment, perfect for co-generational living or those dreaming of their own airbnb. The open Alfresco area has a vibrating European feeling and is guaranteed to keep your guests entertained. A large shed provides the opportunity for a man cave of unmatched proportions. This shed also serves the massive water tank that feeds the gardens, fruit trees and veggie patch. A separate garden shed is located next to veggie patch to keep your tools at hand. A purpose built carport that protects your caravan or boat. Roses and floral vegetation surround the house to provide a classic and elegant look.
Insights: 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SPACIOUS HOME WITH BAY VIEWS, CLOSE TO JETTY, SCHOOLS & PARKLANDS, APPROX. 780 SQM
Take a short walk to the bay, school, across the road to parklands and walk to the corner shop. A spacious home with downstairs living room, meals and kitchen as well as formal dining if you wish or use this space as you require, studio or sunroom. Upstairs living room or library, four bedrooms, master with ensuite, all have robes, central bathroom and three balcony areas. Features include solar power, central heating, woodbox fire, evaporative cooling, pantry, dishwasher and plenty of storage space. The garden is matured with a small orchard, enclosed private courtyard and north facing patio area with a real leafy feel. Double garage, space for more vehicles, even caravan and/ or boat. A strong home which will appeal to the astute buyer with size and loads of potential.

Description:
Classic comfort
Open home has been cancelled due to sale. This lovely colonial home with cottage feel offers three large bedrooms with built in robes, the master with en suite including a claw foot style bath. Open plan living area and kitchen comes with ample cupboard and bench space. The rumpus room can be transformed into a fourth bedroom, home office or stunning alfresco area. With wrap around veranda at the front of the property and a balcony at the rear you will be spoilt for places to entertain. The property features beautiful gardens with blossoming fruit trees, carport, ducted heating and an outdoor undercover patio. Perfect for any size family or those wishing to escape to the serene lifestyle close to Port Phillip Bay and within walking distance to all amenities.

Address: 142 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Water Views At A Basement Level Price!
The 3222 property market is running hot!! This charming entry level home with water views offers an exceptional buying opportunity!
A beautifully orientated split level design creates an elevated living zone complete with towering cathedral ceilings, Coonara heater and lovely water views. The 3 bedrooms are conveniently placed on the lower level as is the family bathroom.
An attractive feature of this property is one's ability to 'value add'; a generous area under the main living zone looks an obvious place to explore an extension (STCA) not to mention various other options to watch your investment grow.
A modern utility shed (9m x 6m) is complete with concrete flooring and double roller doors. A further unexpected characteristic of this property is the addition of solar panels.
Set on a generous parcel of land (601m2 approx) with established trees takes you back to the glory days of good old fashioned back yards; rear access offers further scope for the property.
This property possesses an envious location. It is a short stroll to the waters edge, the No.61 bus stop (Geelong Station) lands almost at your door step and offers easy access to all that is great about the Bellarine Peninsula.
Insights: 142 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 10 Clear Water Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Perfect Starter In Convenient Coastal Location
Positioned in the established and highly sought-after pocket of Clifton Springs is this much-loved home which is primed to start a new chapter – enticing investment opportunity, renovators delight or ideal first home buyer.
Newly carpeted throughout and comprising of three bedrooms, two with built in robes, generous size living area with split system heating and cooling that flows through to the functional kitchen and dining space. A glass sliding door off the dining area leads out onto the undercover decked entertaining area; perfect for social gatherings with family or friends.
Outdoor features a garden shed and single carport, low maintenance gardens and plenty of space for the family to enjoy. The backyard offers easy access onto Clifton Springs Golf Course, which is sure to impress the keen golfer!
Located within walking distance to the beach, local shops and public transport, this home offers affordability in a great central location! The only thing that is missing is your vision and imagination!
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
